alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 10:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Dale, southern Henry and Houston Counties in southeastern Alabama, northeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida, north central Decatur, Miller, southeastern Clay, west central Baker, southwestern Calhoun, Early and Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 1115 PM EDT/1015 PM CDT/... At 1041 PM EDT/941 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Arlington to 10 miles northwest of Donalsonville to Kinsey. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Donalsonville, Blakely, Kinsey, Ashford, Cowarts, Edison, Arlington, Webb, Columbia, Douglasville, Centerville, Malone, Grimes, Avon, Newville and Madrid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
